mod.name: The Evolution
mod.credits:
- Syvaron for most card art and the game that inspired this character. If you are above 18 or 21 years old you can check out his game, Portals of Phereon. 
 - Verburner for the character model, additional card arts and extensive playtesting. Check out his character, The Marked, as well as his other mods! 
 - Johnny Devo for the Mystic, which I used as a base. There might be a few assets haven't replaced yet, those are his. 
 - The STS modding community on Discord. Thanks for your help and companionship!
mod.description:
Adds a new character: The Evolution. 

Wielding the powers of a fallen god this shapeshifter climbs the Spire to save her fading worlds.

cards.name: Drone
cards.description:
Deal 3 damage.
If this is in you hand at the end of your turn gain 2 Block.
Exhaust. Ethereal.

cards.name: Drone+
cards.description:
Deal 5 damage.
If this is in you hand at the end of your turn gain 5 Block.
Exhaust. Ethereal.

cards.name: Feather
cards.description:
Draw a card and discard a card.
Harpy evolutionmod:Form: return a Feather Storm from your discard pile to your hand.

cards.name: Feather+
cards.description:
Draw a card. You may discard a card.
Harpy evolutionmod:Form: return a Feather Storm from your discard pile to your hand.

cards.name: Defend
cards.description: Gain 5 block.

cards.name: Defend+
cards.description: Gain 8 block.

cards.name: Loyal Companion
cards.description:
Gain 10 Block.
Exhaust.
Randomized evolutionmod:Form: gain 4 more Block.

cards.name: Loyal Companion+
cards.description:
Gain 14 Block.
Exhaust.
Startup: Channel a Randomized gene and trigger its effect.

cards.name: Loyal Warrior
cards.description:
Deal 12 damage.
Exhaust.
Randomized evolutionmod:Form: deal 4 more damage.

cards.name: Loyal Warrior+
cards.description:
Deal 16 damage.
Exhaust.
Startup: Channel a Randomized gene and trigger its effect.

cards.name: Strike
cards.description: Deal 6 damage.

cards.name: Strike+
cards.description: Deal 9 damage.

cards.name: Barkskin
cards.description:
Gain 10 Block.
Gain 1 Growth.
Plant evolutionmod:Form: Gain 1 Growth.

cards.name: Barkskin+
cards.description:
Gain 13 Block.
Gain 1 Growth.
Plant evolutionmod:Form: Gain 1 Growth.

cards.name: Charm
cards.description:
Gain 1 Block.
Apply 2 Lust.
Succubus evolutionmod:Form: apply 2 Vulnerable.

cards.name: Charm+
cards.description:
Gain 1 Block.
Apply 4 Lust.
Succubus evolutionmod:Form: apply 2 Vulnerable.

cards.name: Chimera Defense
cards.description:
Gain 7 Block.
evolutionmod:Adapt with your oldest gene up to a maximum of 4.

cards.name: Chimera Defense+
cards.description:
Gain 9 Block.
evolutionmod:Adapt with your oldest gene up to a maximum of 6.

cards.name: Chimera Strike
cards.description:
Deal 7 damage.
evolutionmod:Adapt with your oldest gene up to a maximum of 4.

cards.name: Chimera Strike+
cards.description:
Deal 9 damage.
evolutionmod:Adapt with your oldest gene up to a maximum of 6.

cards.name: Claw slash
cards.description:
Deal 7 damage.
Beast evolutionmod:Form: Refund 1.

cards.name: Claw slash+
cards.description:
Deal 10 damage.
Beast evolutionmod:Form: Refund 1.

cards.name: Crystal Shard
cards.description:
Deal 9 damage.
Randomized evolutionmod:Form:
add 4 damage.
Randomized evolutionmod:Form:
draw a card.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Crystal Shard+
cards.description:
Deal 11 damage.
Randomized evolutionmod:Form:
add 5 damage.
Randomized evolutionmod:Form:
draw a card.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Crystal Stone
cards.description:
Gain 11 Block.
Randomized evolutionmod:Form:
add 3 Block.
Randomized evolutionmod:Form:
Refund 1.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Crystal Stone+
cards.description:
Gain 14 Block.
Randomized evolutionmod:Form:
add 4 Block.
Randomized evolutionmod:Form:
Refund 1.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Dive
cards.description:
Gain 2 Block.
Merfolk evolutionmod:Form: gain 2 more Block.

cards.name: Dive+
cards.description:
Gain 4 Block.
Channel a Merfolk gene.

cards.name: Flame Strike
cards.description:
Deal 10 damage to ALL enemies.
Channel a Lavafolk gene.

cards.name: Flame Strike+
cards.description:
Deal 14 damage to ALL enemies.
Channel a Lavafolk gene.

cards.name: Hatch
cards.description:
Add 3 Drones to your hand.
Channel an Insect gene.

cards.name: Hatch+
cards.description:
Add 3 Drones to your hand.
Channel an Insect gene.
Gain 4 Block.

cards.name: Heavy Kick
cards.description:
Deal 6 damage 2 times.
Centaur evolutionmod:Form: hit 1 more time.

cards.name: Heavy Kick+
cards.description:
Deal 8 damage 2 times.
Centaur evolutionmod:Form: hit 1 more time.

cards.name: Poison Fangs
cards.description:
Deal 7 damage.
Lizard evolutionmod:Form: Apply 4 Poison.

cards.name: Poison Fangs+
cards.description:
Deal 9 damage.
Lizard evolutionmod:Form: Apply 5 Poison.

cards.name: Shadowbolt
cards.description:
Deal 8 damage.
Shadow evolutionmod:Form: gain 2 Shadows.

cards.name: Shadowbolt+
cards.description:
Deal 9 damage.
Shadow evolutionmod:Form: gain 3 Shadows.

cards.name: Shifting guard
cards.description:
Gain 8 Block.
Trigger your first gene.
Shift your first gene.

cards.name: Shifting guard+
cards.description:
Gain 9 Block.
Trigger your first 2 genes and Shift them.

cards.name: Shifting strike
cards.description:
Deal 9 damage.
Trigger your first gene.
Shift your first gene.

cards.name: Shifting strike+
cards.description:
Deal 11 damage.
Trigger your first 2 genes and Shift them.

cards.name: Talon strike
cards.description:
Deal 3 damage
Harpy evolutionmod:Form: draw a card and discard a card.

cards.name: Talon strike+
cards.description:
Deal 6 damage
Harpy evolutionmod:Form: draw a card and discard a card.

cards.name: Visions
cards.description:
Fate 3 cards.
Add a Dazed to your draw pile.
Lymean evolutionmod:Form: Draw a card after Fate.

cards.name: Visions+
cards.description:
Fate 3 cards.
Draw a card.
Add a Dazed to your draw pile.
Lymean evolutionmod:Form: Fate 2 more cards.

cards.name: Adaptation
cards.description: evolutionmod:Adapt with your X oldest genes.

cards.name: Adaptation+
cards.description: evolutionmod:Adapt with X channeled genes of your choice.

cards.name: Antidote
cards.description:
Gain 7 Block.
Exhaust up to 2 random Status from your draw pile.
Lymean evolutionmod:Form: Channel a Lizard gene.

cards.name: Antidote+
cards.description:
Gain 9 Block.
Exhaust up to 3 random Status from your draw pile.
Lymean evolutionmod:Form: Channel a Lizard gene.

cards.name: Aphrodisiac
cards.description:
Apply 2 Lust at the start of next turn.
Succubus evolutionmod:Form: apply 2 Lust.
Lizard evolutionmod:Form: trigger Poison.

cards.name: Aphrodisiac+
cards.description:
Apply 3 Lust at the start of next turn.
Succubus evolutionmod:Form: apply 3 Lust.
Lizard evolutionmod:Form: trigger Poison.

cards.name: Battleborn
cards.description:
Gain 1 Strength.
Centaur evolutionmod:Form: gain 1 Strength.

cards.name: Battleborn+
cards.description:
Gain 2 Strength.
Centaur evolutionmod:Form ->
Beast evolutionmod:Form: gain 1 Strength.

cards.name: Black Cat
cards.description:
Deal 4 damage to ALL enemies.
Beast evolutionmod:Form: deal 3 more damage.
Shadow evolutionmod:Form: trigger Shadows immediately.

cards.name: Black Cat+
cards.description:
Deal 7 damage to ALL enemies.
Beast evolutionmod:Form: deal 3 more damage.
Shadow evolutionmod:Form: trigger Shadows immediately.

cards.name: Calm the Waters
cards.description:
Gain 3 Block.
Fate 2 Skills.
Merfolk evolutionmod:Form: gain 3 more Block.
Lymean evolutionmod:Form: Fate an additional Skill.

cards.name: Calm the Waters+
cards.description:
Gain 6 Block.
Fate 2 Skills.
Channel a Merfolk gene.
Lymean evolutionmod:Form: Fate an additional Skill.

cards.name: Channel magic
cards.description:
Channel a Lavafolk gene.
Fate 2 cards and trigger the gene for each card discarded.
Lymean evolutionmod:Form: Fate 1 more card.

cards.name: Channel magic+
cards.description:
Channel a Lavafolk gene.
Fate 3 cards and trigger the gene for each card discarded.
Lymean evolutionmod:Form: Fate 1 more card.

cards.name: Crystal Dust
cards.description:
Randomized evolutionmod:Form: draw 2 cards.
Exhaust.
Startup: shuffle a copy of this card in your draw pile.

cards.name: Crystal Dust+
cards.description:
Randomized evolutionmod:Form: draw 2 cards.
Exhaust.
Startup: shuffle 2 copies of this card in your draw pile.

cards.name: Currents Dancer
cards.description:
The first time you draw a card after the beginning of your turn gain 4 Block.
Merfolk evolutionmod:Form: draw a card.

cards.name: Currents Dancer+
cards.description:
The first time you draw a card after the beginning of your turn gain 6 Block.
Merfolk evolutionmod:Form: draw a card.

cards.name: Cursed Touch
cards.description:
Deal 4 damage.
Apply 1 Weak.
Shadow evolutionmod:Form: evolutionmod:Adapt this with a Shadow gene.

cards.name: Cursed Touch+
cards.description:
Deal 6 damage.
Apply 2 Weak.
Shadow evolutionmod:Form: evolutionmod:Adapt this with a Shadow gene.

cards.name: Dark Desires
cards.description: Whenever you apply a debuff to an enemy deal 4 damage to it. Succubus evolutionmod:Form: Channel a Shadow gene.

cards.name: Dark Desires+
cards.description: Whenever you apply a debuff to an enemy deal 6 damage to it. Succubus evolutionmod:Form: Channel a Shadow gene.

cards.name: Depths Lurker
cards.description:
Trigger Shadows immediately.
Merfolk evolutionmod:Form: gain Block equal to 2 times your Shadows threshold.

cards.name: Depths Lurker+
cards.description:
Trigger Shadows immediately.
Merfolk evolutionmod:Form: gain Block equal to 3 times your Shadows threshold.

cards.name: Fire Ants
cards.description:
Channel a Lavafolk gene.
Insect evolutionmod:Form: Whenever a Drone is Exhausted this turn trigger your oldest Lavafolk gene.

cards.name: Fire Ants+
cards.description:
Channel a Lavafolk gene.
Whenever a Drone is Exhausted this turn trigger your oldest Lavafolk gene.
Insect evolutionmod:Form: gain a Drone

cards.name: Firebloom
cards.description:
Channel a Lavafolk gene.
Plant evolutionmod:Form: gain 1 Growth for each Lavafolk gene you have.

cards.name: Firebloom+
cards.description:
Channel 2 Lavafolk genes.
Plant evolutionmod:Form: gain 1 Growth for each Lavafolk gene you have.

cards.name: Gene Mastery
cards.description:
When you channel an Imprinted gene, trigger its effect.
Imprinted evolutionmod:Form: gain an Orb slot

cards.name: Gene Mastery
cards.description:
When you channel an Imprinted gene, trigger its effect.
Gain an Orb slot and Channel the Imprinted gene.

cards.name: Heightened senses
cards.description:
Draw 2 cards. Discard any non-Attack drawn this way and gain 1 Rage for each.
Harpy evolutionmod:Form: draw 1 more.
Beast evolutionmod:Form: draw 1 more.

cards.name: Heightened senses+
cards.description:
Draw 3 cards. Discard any non-Attack drawn this way and gain 1 Rage for each.
Harpy evolutionmod:Form: draw 1 more.
Beast evolutionmod:Form: draw 1 more.

cards.name: Hivemind
cards.description:
Fate 1 card for each Drone in your hand.
Insect evolutionmod:Form: add a Drone to your hand first.

cards.name: Hivemind+
cards.description:
Fate 1 card for each Drone in your hand.
Insect evolutionmod:Form: add a Drone to your hand first.
Lymean evolutionmod:Form: add a Drone to your hand first.

cards.name: Leaf Bird
cards.description:
Discard up to 2 cards

Plant evolutionmod:Form: Refund 1.

cards.name: Leaf Bird+
cards.description:
Discard up to 3 cards
Harpy evolutionmod:Form: draw that many.
Plant evolutionmod:Form: Refund 1.

cards.name: Mutate
cards.description: Choose 1 of 3 genes you don't already have and Channel it.

cards.name: Mutate+
cards.description: Choose 1 of 3 genes you don't already have. Channel it and trigger its effect.

cards.name: Night Mare
cards.description:
Deal 8 damage.
Gain Shadows equal to half the unblocked damage dealt.
Shadow evolutionmod:Form: Channel a Centaur gene.

cards.name: Night Mare+
cards.description:
Deal 10 damage.
Gain Shadows equal to half the unblocked damage dealt.
Shadow evolutionmod:Form: Channel a Centaur gene.

cards.name: Pegasus Descent
cards.description:
Deal 7 damage.
Repeat for each 3 [E] cost of cards in your hand.
[#FFFF80]Harpy[] evolutionmod:Form: Channel a [#888888]Centaur[] gene.

cards.name: Pegasus Descent+
cards.description:
Deal 10 damage.
Repeat for each 3 [E] cost of cards in your hand.
[#FFFF80]Harpy[] evolutionmod:Form: Channel a [#888888]Centaur[] gene.

cards.name: Pheromones
cards.description:
Plant evolutionmod:Form ->
Succubus evolutionmod:Form:
apply 2 Vulnerable to ALL enemies.

cards.name: Pheromones+
cards.description:
Apply 1 Vulnerable to ALL enemies.
Plant evolutionmod:Form ->
Succubus evolutionmod:Form:
apply 2 more.

cards.name: Phoenix
cards.description:
Deal 6 damage.
Channel a Lavafolk gene.

cards.name: Phoenix+
cards.description:
Deal 6 damage.
Channel a Lavafolk gene and evolutionmod:Adapt with your oldest one.
Harpy evolutionmod:Form: evolutionmod:Adapt with all your Lavafolk genes.

cards.name: Playing Rough
cards.description:
Deal 11 damage.
Apply Lust equal to half the unblocked damage dealt.
Succubus evolutionmod:Form: Channel a Centaur gene.

cards.name: Playing Rough+
cards.description:
Deal 14 damage.
Apply Lust equal to half the unblocked damage dealt.
Succubus evolutionmod:Form: Channel a Centaur gene.

cards.name: Salamander
cards.description:
Your Lizard genes also deal 2 damage.
Your Lavafolk genes deal 1 more damage.
Lizard evolutionmod:Form: Channel a Lavafolk gene.

cards.name: Salamander+
cards.description:
Your Lizard genes also deal 2 damage.
Your Lavafolk genes deal 1 more damage.
Channel a Lizard gene and a Lavafolk gene.

cards.name: Sea Serpent
cards.description:
Gain 12 Block.
Lizard evolutionmod:Form: Channel a Merfolk gene.

cards.name: Sea Serpent+
cards.description:
Gain 13 Block.
Channel a Lizard gene.
Channel a Merfolk gene.

cards.name: Sea Wolf
cards.description:
Deal 4 damage.
Beast evolutionmod:Form: Refund 1.
Merfolk evolutionmod:Form: gain 3 Block first.

cards.name: Sea Wolf+
cards.description:
Deal 6 damage.
Beast evolutionmod:Form: Refund 1.
Merfolk evolutionmod:Form: gain 4 Block first.

cards.name: Shifting power
cards.description:
Trigger your first gene.
Shift a number of genes equal to your current energy.

cards.name: Shifting power+
cards.description:
Trigger your first 2 genes.
Shift a number of genes equal to your current energy.

cards.name: Shrink
cards.description:
Lose 1 Orb slot.
At the start of your turn, draw 1 additional card.

cards.name: Shrink+
cards.description:
Innate.
Lose 1 Orb slot.
At the start of your turn, draw 1 additional card.

cards.name: Spider Bite
cards.description:
Deal 8 damage.
Add 1 damage for each Drone in your Exhaust pile.
Insect evolutionmod:Form: create and Exhaust 2 Drones.

cards.name: Spider Bite+
cards.description:
Deal 8 damage.
Add 2 damage for each Drone in your Exhaust pile.
Insect evolutionmod:Form: create and Exhaust 2 Drones.

cards.name: Strengthen
cards.description:
Fate 2 Attacks.
Your next attack deals additional damage equal to 2 times their cost.

cards.name: Strengthen+
cards.description:
Fate 2 Attacks.
Your next attack deals additional damage equal to 2 times their cost .
Lymean evolutionmod:Form: Fate 1 more Attack.

cards.name: Strip Armor
cards.description:
Deal 5 damage.
Succubus evolutionmod:Form: Remove all Block from the enemy first.
Beast evolutionmod:Form: add 5 damage.

cards.name: Strip Armor+
cards.description:
Deal 7 damage.
Succubus evolutionmod:Form: Remove all Block from the enemy first.
Beast evolutionmod:Form: add 7 damage.

cards.name: Symbiotes
cards.description:
Whenever Growth produces energy add a Drone to your hand.
Plant evolutionmod:Form: gain 1 Growth.

cards.name: Symbiotes+
cards.description:
Whenever Growth produces energy add a Drone to your hand.
Gain 1 Growth.
Plant evolutionmod:Form: gain 1 Growth.

cards.name: Toxin
cards.description:
Apply 2 Poison.
Lizard evolutionmod:Form ->
Plant evolutionmod:Form:
apply additional Poison equal to 10 % of the enemy's maximum health and Exhaust.

cards.name: Toxin+
cards.description:
Apply 3 Poison.
Lizard evolutionmod:Form ->
Plant evolutionmod:Form:
apply additional Poison equal to 15 % of the enemy's maximum health and Exhaust.

cards.name: Treasure
cards.description:
Choose a Crystal Stone, Shard or Dust to add to your hand.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Treasure+
cards.description:
Choose an upgraded Crystal Stone, Shard or Dust to add to your hand.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Venom Glands
cards.description:
Lizard evolutionmod:Form: Whenever an Attack deals unblocked damage this turn, apply 2 Poison.
Insect evolutionmod:Form: add a Drone to your hand.

cards.name: Venom Glands+
cards.description:
Whenever an Attack deals unblocked damage this turn, apply 2 Poison.
Lizard evolutionmod:Form: add a Drone to your hand.
Insect evolutionmod:Form: add a Drone to your hand.

cards.name: Absorption
cards.description:
Consume your oldest gene.
At the start of your turn trigger its effect.

cards.name: Absorption+
cards.description:
Consume your oldest 2 genes.
At the start of your turn trigger their effect.

cards.name: Broodmother
cards.description:
Your Drones deal 2 more damage and apply 2 more Block.
Channel two Insect genes.

cards.name: Broodmother+
cards.description:
Your Drones deal 3 more damage and apply 3 more Block.
Channel two Insect genes.

cards.name: Drown
cards.description:
Gain 9 Block
At the end of this turn the enemy will take damage equal to your Block.
Channel a Merfolk gene

cards.name: Drown+
cards.description:
Gain 13 Block
At the end of this turn the enemy will take damage equal to your Block.
Channel a Merfolk gene

cards.name: Eruption
cards.description: Every 8 times you deal damage deal 18 damage to ALL enemies.

cards.name: Eruption+
cards.description: Every 8 times you deal damage deal 24 damage to ALL enemies.

cards.name: Feather Storm
cards.description:
Deal 6 damage.
The first time this is played each combat shuffle 2 Feathers into your deck.

cards.name: Feather Storm+
cards.description:
Deal 8 damage.
The first time this is played each combat shuffle 3 Feathers into your deck.

cards.name: Frenzy
cards.description:
Deal 3 damage.
Add 3 damage per [E] spent on attacks this turn.
[#B06060]Beast[] evolutionmod:Form: gain 2 Rage.

cards.name: Frenzy+
cards.description:
Deal 3 damage.
Add 5 damage per [E] spent on attacks this turn.
[#B06060]Beast[] evolutionmod:Form: gain 3 Rage.

cards.name: Godly Powers
cards.description: Each turn the first 2 evolutionmod:Form that Channel a gene also apply their conditional effect.

cards.name: Godly Powers+
cards.description: Each turn the first 3 evolutionmod:Form that Channel a gene also apply their conditional effect.

cards.name: Grow
cards.description: Gain 1 Orb slot. Startup: shuffle a copy of this card in your draw pile.

cards.name: Grow+
cards.description: Gain 1 Orb slot. Startup: shuffle 2 copies of this card in your draw pile.

cards.name: Human Form
cards.description:
Ethereal.
Evoke all your genes.
When you Channel a gene, Evoke it 2 times.

cards.name: Human Form+
cards.description:
Evoke all your genes.
When you Channel a gene, Evoke it 2 times.

cards.name: Lifesteal
cards.description:
Deal 9 damage
Gain Block equal to the unblocked damage.
Exhaust.
Succubus evolutionmod:Form: you are healed instead.

cards.name: Lifesteal+
cards.description:
Deal 12 damage
Gain Block equal to the unblocked damage.
Exhaust.
Succubus evolutionmod:Form: you are healed instead.

cards.name: Photosynthesis
cards.description:
Gain 5 Block X times. Whenever you are attacked this turn, deal 2  X damage back.
Plant evolutionmod:Form: evolutionmod:Adapt this with a Plant gene.

cards.name: Photosynthesis+
cards.description:
Gain 7 Block X times. Whenever you are attacked this turn, deal 2  X damage back.
Plant evolutionmod:Form: evolutionmod:Adapt this with a Plant gene.

cards.name: Ritual
cards.description:
Permanently evolutionmod:Adapt this with your oldest gene not already adapted.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Ritual+
cards.description:
Permanently evolutionmod:Adapt this with your oldest gene not already adapted.
Ethereal.

cards.name: Stalker
cards.description:
Deal 4 damage and apply 6 Poison to all enemies that have Poison.
Channel a Lizard gene.

cards.name: Stalker+
cards.description:
Deal 4 damage and apply 9 Poison to all enemies that have Poison.
Channel a Lizard gene.

cards.name: Stampede
cards.description:
Deal 6 damage.
Deal 6 damage to ALL enemies twice.
Channel a Centaur gene.

cards.name: Stampede+
cards.description:
Deal 8 damage.
Deal 8 damage to ALL enemies twice.
Channel a Centaur gene.

cards.name: The Future Is Now
cards.description:
Play cards from your draw pile until their cost would exceed X.
Exhaust.
Lymean evolutionmod:Form: Fate 2 cards first.

cards.name: The Future Is Now+
cards.description:
Play cards from your draw pile until their cost would exceed X.
Lymean evolutionmod:Form: Fate 2 cards first.

cards.name: The Night
cards.description:
Increase the damage dealt by each stack of Shadows by 2.
Channel a Shadow gene.

cards.name: The Night+
cards.description:
Increase the damage dealt by each stack of Shadows by 3.
Channel a Shadow gene.

relics.name: Tori's gift
relics.description: Start each combat with a random Gene.

relics.name: Nimble Boots
relics.description: Whenever you play 5 or more cards in a turn, draw an additional card at the start of your next turn.

relics.name: Power Focus
relics.description: The first Gene you Evoke each turn is evoked twice.

relics.name: Magic Focus
relics.description: The first Skill you play each combat is played twice.

relics.name: Scout Medal
relics.description: At the start of the combat Fate 1 card of each type.

relics.name: Strength Focus
relics.description: The first Attack you play each combat is played twice.
relics.flavorText: I'm not sure if it still works.

relics.name: Old Outfit
relics.description: Gain [E] at the start of your turn. The first Gene you Channel each turn is removed.
relics.flavorText: My favourite outfit, when I was human.

relics.name: Tori
relics.description: Start each combat with 1 additional Orb slot and random genes in all Orb slots.
relics.flavorText: She's found her way back to you.

relics.name: Whip
relics.description: Whenever you apply a debuff to an enemy, they take 2 damage.
relics.flavorText: I can use this as a weapon?

potions.name: Mutagen
potions.description: Select up to 2 genes you don't already have and Channel them.

keywords.name: Growth
keywords.description: Upon reaching 2 Growth gain 1 Energy and reduce Growth by 2

keywords.name: Vigor
keywords.description: Increases the damage of your next Attack.

keywords.name: Drone
keywords.description: Drones are 0 cost attacks which benefit from Potency, are Ethereal and Exhaust when played.

keywords.name: Adapt
keywords.description:
Consume a channeled Gene. Add its effect to the card until the end of the combat and shuffle this card in your draw pile.
Adapted effects target the same enemy as the card if possible.

keywords.name: Form
keywords.description: Trigger the following effect if you have a Gene of this type, otherwise Channel one.

keywords.name: Fate X
keywords.description: Put random cards from your draw pile matching X on top of your draw pile, then Scry them.

keywords.name: Lust
keywords.description: Reduce the base damage of the next attack by this amount.

keywords.name: Rage
keywords.description: Whenever you play an Attack this turn, gain this amount of Block.

keywords.name: Randomized
keywords.description: Randomized Forms are selected when the card is created and vary from a card to another.

keywords.name: Shadows
keywords.description: When Shadows reaches its threshold it deals 2 damage per stack and applies 1 Weak to all enemies. The first threshold is 1.

keywords.name: Shift
keywords.description: Recreate the gene at the back of the orb line.
